description:
Cozy artist loft in the heart of industrial Brooklyn. Close to hip restaurants and bars in Bushwick and East Williamsburg. I am within a 5-minute walk to the famous Roberta's.  I also live close to trains that will get you into Manhattan in under 10 minutes. 
JMZ train - 5-minute walk
G train - 10-minute walk
L train - 7-minute walk

The apartment is ideal for 1-2 people.  However, there is a lofted space with a mattress that can accommodate two more people.
name: Artist Loft in East Williamsburg
review: Titi was a great host with clear communication throughout the stay. The place was very nice and received many compliments from guests. It is very spacious and comfortably fit many guests for a dinner. Overall very nice experience and I would definitely recommend this place!
